meanings.definition: Behaving in a playful or alluring way towards someone.
meanings.sent1: She gave him a flirty smile during the party.
meanings.sent2: The flirty tone in her voice caught his attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat's flirty behavior towards the yarn was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The flirty dance of the flames in the fireplace was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The flirty fragrance of the flowers filled the room with a sweet charm.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of seriousness or interest in a playful manner.
meanings.sent1: He made a flirty comment about the weather to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent2: Her flirty attitude towards the assignment annoyed her teacher.
meanings.sent3: The flirty way he avoided doing chores was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The flirty colors of the painting added a whimsical touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The flirty melody of the song made it hard to take seriously.
